data.text: @AloysuisA @ichudov @drbeen_medical @merogenomics is the case for VAIDS growing from your perspectives?

@ichudov It's a shame the FDA depends on Pfizer to prepare a report on long term effects including #VAIDS by August 2023. Why ask a profit hungry corporation to be honest about the dangers of its own product.

@RenfroSpucky @ichudov To accept the alternative, that's it's the 'vaccines', will be a difficult thing for people to come to terms with. Not only because they were tricked (they were) but once it's in you it's in you. The vaxxed can't know what future problems lie in wait. No one knows
@HOM3O What is the best time of day to take niacin?
@ichudov how stupid are these doctors to don't see how clear is this comes from those two lethal injections, these is their purpose: lethal weapons for the weak.

@worldedge_group @Flowmodus_ @ichudov If guy in thread is unvaxed then shouldn't Broad spectrum natueal immunity recognise some parts enough to deal easily with his omicron infection even if distant cousin (as SaarS 1 ppl had tcell reactivity to saars 2)? Of course jabbed different case as tampered immune system.
@ichudov @Storiesofinjury "Ps vaxxed and boosted" as a footnote at the end 😄 That should be his headline.
